au10 Package¶

Controller Module¶

class au10.Controller.Controller¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Controlles the GUI

__init__()¶
bind_buttons()¶

Binds the buttons to functions. :return: None

handle_check()¶

Handles the check: that is sending a blocking request and resolving possible errors. When the request is successful the output textBox will show the formatted info. :return: None

handle_close()¶

Called when the user presses the close button :return:

handle_reset()¶

called when the user presses the reset button. Clears all Inputs :return: None

main Module¶

Entrypoint for the program creates a QApplication and hosts the GUI.
